title: LiveCode Room
description: A real-time collaborative code editor built with React, Express, and Socket.IO ‚Äî allowing multiple users to write and sync code instantly in shared rooms, join via unique room IDs, and experience live updates & Seamless Connectivity.

title: AI Image Enhancer
description: Increasing the resolution of low-quality images while maintaining or enhancing detail and sharpness, often using super-resolution algorithms.Implemented loading indicators, error handling, and real-time enhancement previews for improved UX.

title: Smart_Home_Automation
description: SmartHomeApp is a terminal-based Java application built using Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles. It allows users to control smart devices like fans, lights, TVs, and ACs using interactive console inputs.
